articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Samsung takes on Apple’s Vision Pro with new Galaxy XR headset - TechCrunch
articles.description: Galaxy XR costs $1,800, nearly half the price of the Vision Pro.
articles.content: After months of speculation, Samsung has finally unveiled its Galaxy XR headset to take on Apple’s Vision Pro. The headset runs on Google’s Android XR operating system and Qualcomm’s Snapdragon XR2+ … [+2756 chars]
